get: SELECT * FROM user u INNER JOIN person per ON per.idPerson = u.idPerson WHERE u.erased = FALSE
getId: SELECT * FROM user u INNER JOIN person per ON per.idPerson = u.idPerson WHERE u.idUser = ? AND u.erased = FALSE
put: SELECT DISTINCT idPerson FROM user WHERE erased = FALSE AND idUser = ?
delete: SELECT idperson FROM user WHERE iduser = ? AND erased = FALSE
UPDATE person SET erased = TRUE WHERE idperson = ? AND erased = FALSE
UPDATE user SET erased = TRUE WHERE iduser = ? AND erased = FALSE
